messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spelling was: New to the list {Buzz}
messages.msgSnippet: I think spelt is a word that was spelled -no pun intended-spelt until early this century. You have just been reading those Little House books to the littles
messages.messageBody:
I think spelt is a word that was spelled -no pun intended-spelt until early
this century. You have just been reading those Little House books to the
littles and it stuck in your head!I always spelled color colour in school and
got it marked wrong but i thought it was prettier! Today my 5yo son asked for
the report card to put in the atm! i love this stuff and think life would be
pretty boring without it!
Bridget
